en: Protection against flooding: early warning system with sensors and artificial intelligence. An early warning system with sensors and calculations from artificial intelligence is intended to warn citizens in the Bergstrasse district of floods at an early stage in the future. The Fulda district is a model for this.
la: Praesidium contra inundationem: ratio praenuntia cum sensoriis et intellegentiae artificialis. Exemplar huius regionis Fuldensis est.
